text: Avaṉiṭamē maṟaivāṉavaṟṟiṉ tiṟavukōlkaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa. Avaṟṟai avaṉaṉṟi evarum aṟiyār. Mēlum karaiyilum kaṭalilum uḷḷavaṟṟaiyellām avaṉ aṟivāṉ; avaṉ aṟiyāmal ōr ilaiyum utirvatillai. Pūmiyiṉ (āḻattil aṭarnta) iruḷkaḷil kiṭakkum ciṟu vittum, pacumaiyāṉatum, ularntatum (entap poruḷum) teḷivāṉa (avaṉuṭaiya) pativēṭṭil illāmalillai
